sentences.sContent: The consolidation of the beautifier of life, the society.
sentences.sContent_eng: The consolidation of the beautifier of life, the society.
sentences.sCn: 生活的美化者，社会的巩固者。

sentences.sContent: Enable users to submit consolidation nodes, even if not all leaf nodes have been opened.
sentences.sContent_eng: Enable users to submit consolidation nodes, even if not all leaf nodes have been opened.
sentences.sCn: 允许用户提交合并结点，即使并非所有的叶子节点都已打开。

sentences.sContent: The combination of the friendship, the heart of the mystery! The beautifier of life, the consolidation of society!
sentences.sContent_eng: The combination of the friendship, the heart of the mystery! The beautifier of life, the consolidation of society!
sentences.sCn: 友谊，那心灵的神秘的结合者！生活的美化者，社会的巩固者！

phrases.pCn: 次固结，次生固结；二次固结
固结沉降；地基应力和变形固结沉降
固结系数；压实系数；土的物理性质压密系数
固结试验，圧密试験；室内土工试验

remMethod.val: con(共同) + solid(结实的) + ation → 联合在一起使更加结实 → 合并； 巩固

words.tran: 巩固的；统一的；整理过的
合并；巩固（consolidate的过去分词形式）；统一

trans.tranOther: the act of consolidating or state of being consolidated
